attributes.additional_details: It is time for an immediate in out referendum on the EU.  The British people signed up to trade with Europe through the Common market, but not to have ourselves governed by the EU.  This would allow £53 million a day, to be spent on more worthwhile projects across the UK, allow us to determine who crosses our borders and to determine our own laws again, especially human rights.  We the British people never signed up to be in the European Union.
